scripts.build: tsc && npm run popup-build && npm run todo-build && npm run manager-build && npm run background-build
scripts.pack: npm run build && cd dist && web-ext build --overwrite-dest
scripts.install: npm run install-todo && npm run install-manager && npm run install-popup && npm run install-background
scripts.untrack: git rm -r --cached . && git add . && git commit -m "fixed untracked files"
